liquid.gui

Class EnviroPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • liquid.gui.EnviroPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class EnviroPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class is a branch of the EnvironmentEditorPanel. Here, all elements linked to creating the size of the environment are present, such as the length and width.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnviroPanel

        public EnviroPanel()
        Constructor creates the Environment section of the EnvironmentEditorPanel.

    • Method Detail

      • initComponents

        public void initComponents()
        Method creates the labels and drop-downs associated with setting the environment's size.

      • enviroParam

        public void enviroParam()
        Method sets the boundaries, or size, of the environment. The limit of the length and width are defined separately in order for real-time updates of the other parameters to occur.

      • drawButton

        public void drawButton()
        Method creates the button to adjust the size of the environment itself.

      • updateEnviro

        public void updateEnviro()
        Method sets the parameters of the Environment section of the EnvironmentEditorPanel.

      • updateLimits

        public void updateLimits()
        Resets the limits to adjust the boundaries of creating various objects.

      • resetEnviro

        public void resetEnviro()
        Method resets the parameters of the Environment section.
